#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std ;

const int MAXN = 1e5;

char str[MAXN+5];

int main() {
//    freopen("awesome.in","r",stdin);
    int c,c2;
    scanf("%s",str);
    int len = strlen(str);
    int ret = -1;
    char best;
    char ch = '-';
    int cur = -2;
    for (c=0;c<=len;c++) {
        if (str[c] != ch) {
            if (ret < cur || ret == cur && best > ch) {
                ret = cur;
                best = ch;
            }
            cur = 1;
            ch = str[c];
        } else cur++;
    }
    printf("%c\n%d\n",best,ret);
    return 0;
}
